Text: FW RIR Advertising Green CardFYI Original Message From Daffin Margaret Sent Wednesday October PM To Bondareva Natalie Subject RIR Advertising Green Card Natalie for your information your RIR Advertising for your Green Card will start on Sunday October in the Houston Chronicle for the ad of Senior Specialist Transaction Support The six months of advertising will finish next March so your Labor Certification will be filed in April Margaret

FW Check out the events for the weekendCheck this out poka ya proveryayu Original Message From Kogotkov Mikhail Sent Wednesday November PM To Bondareva Natalie Subject Check out the events for the weekend Visual Arts Events profile csCDAstoryhtsaeart csCDAstoryhtsaeart camexhandprogramsexschedhtmlacconci csCDAstoryhtsaeart Performances Main Street Theater June Moon Comedy This should be an awesome performance I have been to teir plays in the past and those were great profile csCDAstoryhtsaetheater profile

FW HPST Read below and dont make me follow up on any bar gossip again Original Message From Daffin Margaret Sent Thursday November AM To Bondareva Natalie Subject RE H Natalie this is not true you would have to extend your HIB visa in order to continue working in the US I do it all the time for our employees Margaret Original Message From Bondareva Natalie Sent Thursday November AM To Daffin Margaret Subject H Margaret Thank you for your reply yesterday I heard rumors that once you apply for green card you cant extend your HB visa status for another years Please tell me if it is true Thank you Natalie

FWPST Original Message From Daffin Margaret Sent Wednesday November PM To Reyes Pauline Bondareva Natalie Cc Tessandori Bobbi Subject FW Ladies you both asked the same question so here is the attorneys response Please pass on to other concerned individuals Thanks Margaret Original Message From Alice Gruber ENRON Sent Wednesday November PM To Daffin Margaret Subject RE An HB Temporary Worker is technically violating status once she has been terminated Once the H is out of status in theory she is technically required to depart the US as soon as possible If the H can find a new employer and file within approximately to days from the date of termination the INS has generally overlooked the violation of the maintenance of status Keep in mind this is not a hard and fast rule and the INS has the ability to enforce shorter or longer periods on a casebycase basis Enron has generally waited days prior to information the INS of foreign nationals termination in order to allow foreign nationals to take advantage of this informal INS policy If you are currently an HB nonimmigrant in the US and you have not violated your status such as by beginning work for a different employer then you may likely be able to take advantage of a new portability provision in the amendments to the Immigration Nationality Act This allows for the new prospective employer to file an amended HB petition and for the HB Temporary Worker to begin working with the new employer once the petition is filed rather than having to wait several months for the case to be approved prior to transferring to the new employer You should likely meet with an immigration attorney in person as soon as possible after being laid off so that you are advised of all the possible options that may be open to you Original Message From Daffin Margaret mailtoMargaret NRONcom Sent Wednesday November PM To Alice Gruber Cc Susan King Subject FW Alice do you have any answer for this one Margaret Original Message From Reyes Pauline Sent Wednesday November PM To Daffin Margaret Subject Margaret In a bankruptcy situation will lawyers provide H grace period If so for how long Thanks Pauline This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

FW Tis the SeasonPST Original Message From Renaud Lindsay Sent Wednesday November AM To Driscoll Sarah Marye David Bhatia Randy Audra Holland Marye Email Ali Picheloup Email Helen Young Email Nancy Murphy Email Ricky Nuila Email Marks James Bondareva Natalie Wussow Christy Hawkins Darian Blanchard Timothy Hatten Micah Subject Tis the Season Importance High Happy Holidays Many of us may not be feeling all that cheerful these days and may not even realize that it is the holiday season So I decided its time to celebrate and spread a little Christmas cheer What better way to kick off the holiday season and forget about your worries than with good friends So come spread good cheer or just drown your sorrows if you wish but come Bring your wives husbands etc and your favorite holiday beverage Oh and I dont want any excuses about some football game that may be on TV Holiday Bash Saturday December th pm My Apartment Brompton Call for directions let me know if youre coming Lindsay Lindsay Renaud EnronOnline

FW HB visa processPST Original Message From Daffin Margaret Sent Wednesday November AM To Bondareva Natalie Subject RE HB visa process Natalie If it happens you have approx days to find another position before we cancel the HIB with the INS Lets think positive Margaret Original Message From Bondareva Natalie Sent Wednesday November AM To Daffin Margaret Subject HB visa process Margaret Could you please tell me how many days will I have to find a new job to maintain my HB visa status in case Im laid off by Enron Everything is fine right now Im working but I just want to know what options I have in a worstcase scenario Thank you Natalie

Hi Geoff How are you Hows Vicki doing Is she and the baby already at home Vladi probably told you about the reorg in EES Currently I am looking for a position in Commodity Structuring Gas or Power Do you by chance know anybody who I can talk to about a position in these groups Natalie
